mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_chat_room_user ( room_id, user_id, last_read_msg_id, joined_at ) VALUES ( #{room_id}, #{user_id}, #{last_read_msg_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_msg m JOIN tbl_chat_room_user cru ON m.room_id = cru.room_id WHERE cru.user_id = #{user_id} AND cru.room_id = #{room_id} AND m.msg_id > NVL(cru.last_read_msg_id, 0)
